description: I plan and run immersive listening events - coordinating tech setup, artists, and audiences to create memorable spatial audio experiences. Lots of real-time troubleshooting and keeping multiple moving parts synchronized.

Bridged design and engineering by prototyping interfaces, building reusable component libraries, and creating tools that automated designer workflows. Helped build Indeed's first comprehensive design system - basically creating shortcuts so teams could move faster without reinventing the wheel each time.

Moved from manual testing to building automated test systems that caught bugs early. Worked directly with engineering to identify issues, document clearly, and streamline the path from code to production through CI/CD pipelines.

Built and maintained digital presence while organizing large-scale tech conferences and a mobile game accelerator. Learned to manage both technical systems and the human logistics of getting 200+ people working together effectively.
Learned and developed micro controller, projection mapping and creative software systems for interactive art installations and gallery showcase.

Assisted recording sessions at a historic studio - managing signal flow, equipment setup, and whatever kept sessions productive. Learned technical precision matters, but so does reading the room and maintaining good creative energy.
